summary: This bill, the EARLY Act Reauthorization of 2025, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to reauthorize the Young Women’s Breast Health Education and Awareness Requires Learning Young Act of 2009. The bill amends Section 399NN(h) of the Public Health Service Act, extending the program's authorization to 2031. This legislation seeks to continue funding and support for breast health education and awareness programs for young women.
